## PhysicalProductInterface interface

PhysicalProductInterface contains attributes specific to tangible products.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PhysicalProductInterface 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [weight?](./magento-api.physicalproductinterface.weight.md) | Maybe&lt;Scalars\['Float'\]&gt; | <i>(Optional)</i> The weight of the item, in units defined by the store. |
